name: Back to the Forest
description:
A 10 minute interactive story inspired by survival horror game The Forest.

This project combined 3 of my favorite things in 2021.

Controls

Simply click with a mouse or tap on a touch screen. This game is intended to be played horizontally on phones.

Acknowledgement

I used The Forest main menu music for my intro and outro (sample). The other sound effects were found on OpenGameArt (interstate sounds) and YouTube (forest sound, brown noise).

The project was developed using libGDX and its source code is on GitHub.
